body_html:
I verified that I'm getting the same issue in a python 3.5 environment. Must be some other issue with my setup? 😕

    x = tf.keras.layers.TimeDistributed(model)(frame_input)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/engine/topology.py", line 253, in __call__
    output = super(Layer, self).__call__(inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py", line 591, in __call__
    outputs = self.call(inputs, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers/wrappers.py", line 238, in call
    output_shape = self._compute_output_shape(input_shape).as_list()
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers/wrappers.py", line 193, in _compute_output_shape
    child_input_shape).as_list()
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'as_list'

body:
I verified that I'm getting the same issue in a python 3.5 environment. Must be some other issue with my setup? 😕 

```
    x = tf.keras.layers.TimeDistributed(model)(frame_input)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/engine/topology.py", line 253, in __call__
    output = super(Layer, self).__call__(inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/layers/base.py", line 591, in __call__
    outputs = self.call(inputs, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers/wrappers.py", line 238, in call
    output_shape = self._compute_output_shape(input_shape).as_list()
  File "/home/guest/anaconda3/envs/tf35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/layers/wrappers.py", line 193, in _compute_output_shape
    child_input_shape).as_list()
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'as_list'
```
